Metadata.Title: The Information Security Policy Includes Key-management Procedures
Metadata.DirectLink: The Information Security Policy Includes Key-management Procedures
Metadata.Author: Serge Batchilo, Jason Taylor, Joe Basirico

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 3.6.a

What to Check For

The information security policy should include key-management procedures.

Why

Proper key management procedures ensure that cryptography is applied correctly and securely.

How to Check

Review the information security policy to make sure it includes key-management procedures.

How to Fix

Identify the company's cryptography needs. Design and implement key management procedures to accommodate those needs.

Additional Resources

  • For more information about key management procedures, please see http://csrc.nist.gov  
  • For more information about designing and documenting key management procedures, please see http://www.net-security.org/article.php?id=1185
